证据片段: It is generally assumed that the in-reactor stress-induced strain has two components, thermal and irradiation creep strain [3]. 证据片段: The four primary Zircaloy fuel cladding deformation phenomena—axial elongation, circumferential creep, ovalization, and ridging-have been investigated for fuel irradiated in four modern pressurized water reactors.

证据片段: For nonfueled rods, the texture is found to influence elongation.

证据片段: Figure 4 gives an estimate of $d \epsilon _ { \tt c } / d \epsilon _ { \tt a }$ as a function of temperature and material condition. Note that the material tends toward isotropy $( d \epsilon _ { \mathrm { { c } } } / d \epsilon _ { \mathrm { { a } } }$ $\ l \to \ 1 )$ at high temperatures. Note also that strain aging may lead to a reversal in anisotropy $( d \epsilon _ { \tt c } / d \epsilon _ { \tt a } > 1 )$ in fully recrystallized material [3]. Finally, note that irradiation suppresses the strain-aging response, and irradiated material is expected to exhibit behavior similar to that of unirradiated, cold-worked material.

证据片段: In zirconium and Zircaloy, the development of the strong deformation texture is caused by the complicated interaction between slip and twinning.

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_004_chunk1
证据片段: For metals or alloys with a below-normal c/a ratio (c/a < 1.633), as for example zirconium, titanium, and hafnium, the position of the basal poles is tilted by ±30 to 50 deg from the normal direction toward the transverse direction.

证据片段: Experiments following the texture development in polycrystalline material, including also lower degrees of deformation, are described in Ref 16. The activated deformation systems had been followed in detail after various sequential rolling steps in the individual grains of a polycrystal with an almost random orientation.

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_004_chunk1
证据片段: The results show that in a coarse-grained polycrystal the criterion of compatibility by von Mises [17] is fulfilled; that is, in each individual grain at least five mutually independent deformation systems are activated.

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_004_chunk2
证据片段: The effect of slip on the lattice rotation is shown in Fig. 1. As the slip traces show, threefold slip of the main slip system on prism planes in the a-direction does occur.

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_004_chunk2
证据片段: Simultaneously with slip, twinning is activated even at low degrees of deformation, for example, 0.5 percent (see Fig. 2).

证据片段: The in-reactor corrosion susceptibility of Zircaloy-4 fuel rod cladding is dependent on the thermo-mechanical treatment received by the cladding after beta quenching. Longer annealing times and higher annealing temperatures in the alpha range lead in general to better corrosion performance.

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk4
证据片段: sharp transition between nodular-free and nodular-covered regions of some fuel rods

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk4
证据片段: additional demand on zirconium-alloy structural materials, especially fuel-element cladding

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk4
证据片段: much longer spent-fuel storage times prior to disposal

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk5
证据片段: zirconium alloys did not swell significantly from the formation of irradiation-induced voids for light water reactor (LWR) conditions

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk5
证据片段: irradiation enhanced creep during irradiation but inhibited creep postirradiation

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk5
证据片段: creep of the pressure tube also was an issue due to the long exposure times

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk6
证据片段: For very-long-term storage, inert atmospheres would prevent corrosion and hydrogen pickup.

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk6
证据片段: Gd-doped $\mathbf { U } \mathbf { O } _ { 2 }$ rods, which had low-heat-fluxes early in life, had more nodules than $\mathbf { U } \mathbf { O } _ { 2 }$ rods

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk7
证据片段: Hydrogen pickup increased with increasing solute concentration and with decreasing initial SPP sizes

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk7
证据片段: increase in the coolant dissolved H₂ content decreases the oxide potential drop

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk7
证据片段: increased water H₂ content decreases the driving force of the potential gradient on H⁺ diffusion through the oxide

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk7
证据片段: PWR temperatures are high enough for hydrogen to diffuse from the base of an SPP before forming a hydride

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk7
证据片段: diffusion is slower in BWRs due to the lower BWR temperatures

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk7
证据片段: when a PWR operates with low dissolved H₂ in the coolant, nodules do form

证据片段: nodule formation is associated with corrosion potentials of no more than 600 mV

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk8

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk8

文献ID: STP1529-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_16th Volume_007_chunk8
证据片段: H2 additions reduce the ECP by 450-600 mV

证据片段: Etoh et al. [35] conducted postirradiation corrosion tests on as-irradiated and on irradiated and annealed nodule-susceptible Zircaloy-2. They found that nodular-susceptible Zircaloy did not form nodules when corrosion tested after irradiation. However, when postirradiation annealing was performed to precipitate the solutes into SPPs prior to corrosion testing, nodules formed in subsequent corrosion testing

证据片段: At room temperature, zirconium is in the $\mathscr { X }$ phase, and the grains have a hexagonal crystal structure that results in them having anisotropic properties.

证据片段: We conclude that the initial metallurgical properties of the tubing have little influence on the defect behavior of power ramped fuel; thus the limits on mechanical property requirements of the sheath have become less stringent.
